title: Dr. Daniele Florean
text:
I am sociologist and demographer by training. I have a strong quantitative approach and a strong training in quantitative analysis methods, but I highly value qualitative insights.
I worked on family formation dynamics, marriage, partnership patterns and transition to parenthood.
I am interested in anything related to social inequalities, life course development, structural change and a little bit of historical demography. I am also more and more interested in science communicaiton and data visualization.
For more information about my past and current research, see my portfolio.

title: About myself
text:
Originally from a city just on the side of Milano, Italy, I moved to Germany in 2017 to pursue a double degree Master program. I obtained my Master degree and my Doctoral degree from the universities of Bamberg and HU Berlin, respectively.
Now I live in the north of Bayern with my partner and two cats.

In my free time, I volunteer at a bike co-op and enjoy riding my bikes (plural) in the beautiful hills around my home.

title: About myself
